mapper.insert: insert into foxbpm_run_processinstance (ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, SUBJECT, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFINITION_ID, ROOTTOKEN_ID, BIZ_KEY, INITIATOR, START_AUTHOR, ISSUSPENDED, PARENT_ID, PARENT_TOKEN_ID, UPDATE_TIME, PROCESSLOCATION, INSTANCE_STATUS, ARCHIVE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{definitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initiator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuspended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.sql: ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, SUBJECT, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFINITION_ID, ROOTTOKEN_ID, BIZ_KEY, INITIATOR, START_AUTHOR, ISSUSPENDED, PARENT_ID, PARENT_TOKEN_ID, UPDATE_TIME, PROCESSLOCATION, INSTANCE_STATUS, ARCHIVE_TIME
